title: Whole laptop Crashes while playing Invasion ( AMD Radeon HD 6650 )
body:
Hello guys, As the title says my whole Laptop crashes ( Sudden Black screen,But I still hear the game's music then it stops , And doesn't work until I restart my whole computer only to crash again ) 

It crashes each 2 to 3 mins

It used to happen on twisted treeline but stopped somehow 

Any help?

PS : I always play on very low

replies.body: I wonder if some of those game files for Invasion got corrupted or damaged somehow. Let's try running a quick repair through the client to see if that fixes that black screen. If not go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some deeper troubleshooting.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u1hwMfw0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-08T00:51:36.528+0000)

If not go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some deeper troubleshooting.

I tried repairing but it did nothing

Capping the fps to 60 fixed the problem tho, Ty for your help.
